HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: - New: Colonists can now be directed to use the couch |- New: German localization |- Tweak: Colonists will stop therapy when they should be sleeping or meditating |- Tweak: Tuned room beauty impact |img:images/Patron |caption: If you enjoy this and my other mods, and want to support their development, I'd love to welcome you as a patron! You can have a say what I spend my time on, take part in my mod community or get technical help. So if you feel curious, grateful or generous, please take a look by clicking the link above! |If a mod update causes issues, don't hesitate to contact me (and remember to include the Ctrl-F12 error log!).
